explanation: [0-0] Two men are standing in a boxing ring. One man has black hair and is wearing black shorts with letters on them. The other man is bald. There is a red pillar in the ring, supporting black and red lines around the ring. Behind the ring are the audience seats, which are filled with people watching the match.
